iati-activity.title: NGO Support / Participation of the Citizen and Food Security
iati-activity.description: The goal of the project is to improve the production and diversity of food and empower the people about their own rights and encourage them to express their opinions in four villages in Nicaragua. Within in a project there are loans to cultivation utensil, cattle and farming land. The project is promoting the organisation of the communities and also education according to that will be organised. This new project is based on Food Security project implemented 2004-2006 (3641890).

location.name: Esteli, Madriz and Nueva Segovia districts

iati-activity.title: NGO Support / Advanced training of peer educators in early childhood development
iati-activity.description: The project will continue serving the core issues attended by SOYNICA, while also introducing new elements identified as rising needs, such as the need for professional development of the peer-educators and the field of ECD (Early Childhood Development)in general in Nicaragua, and at the same time strengthening attention to themes where adequate results have not yet been obtained, such as forming strategic alliances and strong links of coordination with other relevant actors to seek sustainability for SOYNICA approach.

iati-activity.title: Youth Protecting Our Environment
iati-activity.description: The aim of the project is to enhance the youth's environmental awareness and to improve environmental education in Matagalpa Nicaragua. The main idea is to develop a new model for environmental education, which will be piloted in 5 schools and 2 youth environmental organisations. In piloting phase there will be altogether 870 beneficiaries. Supporting activities are forestation and recycling. For these supporting activities there will be 750-800 participants annually. Environmental education model and recycling practices will be spread outside the piloting schools with the help of the local administration.

iati-activity.title: Strengthening of Rural Development and Porverty Reduction Fomevidas II
iati-activity.description: FOMEVIDAS II represents a strategic alternative for the eradiction of poverty in the provinces of Boaco, Chontales and RAAS, using an approach stressing economic inclusion, gender equality and sustainable adaptation to climatic change. It will be implemented as an economic inclusion strategy for the poor. The main objective is to reduce poverty in areas mentioned above. Other objectives are to contribute to sustainable economic insertion and competitiveness to increase degree of development among human capital and to strenghthen the IDR institutional capacity. Programme authorities are MFA of Finland and Nicragua (Minrex). IDR is programme implementing agency. Territorial delegations from provinces Boaco, Chontales and RAAS.

iati-activity.title: Eco-Women of Achuapa and San Dionisio
iati-activity.description: Empowering women of Acuapa and San Dionisio districts. The project aims to achieve the targets by four components: small scale production, equality education and assitance of the school attendance of the poorest children. The problems and the results of the project will be published through different news media.
